job_description:
TalentNeuron is a top-of-the-line HR analytics enterprise software-as-a-service product that utilizes a vast array of public data sets, including profiles, jobs, companies, universities, demographics, and skills. The product leverages cutting-edge cloud, big data, and open source technologies, frameworks, and toolsets. TalentNeuron stands as the world's foremost provider of global talent demand and supply data, offering real-time insights and predictive analytics on the job market, location, and competitive intelligence to assist clients in making informed human capital decisions, streamlining workforce access, and advancing corporate diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. Our clients include market leaders like Southwest, Nestle, Verizon, Facebook as well as hundreds of large and midsized enterprise companies, and that list is growing quickly.

About Your Role

As a Senior Software Developer on the Middleware team, you will manage developing and supporting the Middleware layer of our software products. You will work closely with other software engineers, product managers, and stakeholders to ensure that our Middleware layer meets the needs of our customers & platform and is scalable, reliable, and efficient.

What You Will Do

Design & develop (middleware) components and services for our software products.
Drive the integration of the middleware layer with other parts of the system.
Work with product managers and stakeholders to understand the domain, business model and translate requirements into technical solutions.
Ensure that the middleware layer is scalable, reliable, and efficient.
Write and maintain technical documentation for the middleware layer.
Participate in code reviews and provide feedback to other software engineers.
Mentor new or junior development team members.
Support automation efforts by utilizing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform, Configuration Management, and Continuous Integration (CI)/ Continuous Delivery (CD) tools such as Jenkins.
Work with the team to implement data governance, access control, and identify and reduce security risks.
Contribute to continual improvement by suggesting improvements to application architecture, user interface, and applying the latest technologies.
Work independently or within a team, proactively, in a fast-paced Agile-SCRUM environment.

What You Will Need

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related engineering field experience in software development
5+ years of experience in Java Spring or similar J2EE frameworks.
5+ years of experience coding using object-oriented and aspect-oriented programming, architecture, and design patterns.
Proven experience in designing and developing middleware components and services.
Proven experience with search engines like ElasticSearch
Experience with API design and development using REST.
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Java.
Strong proficiency with unit testing and end-to-end testing.
Strong understanding of RESTful API principles.
